page.title: 11MY DAY AT THE FIESTA
page.content: About 100 balloons competed in a spectacular weekend.My favourite balloons were {DAWSONS TOYS , {POLLYWALLETS, COLT CARS, PLANTERS {PEANUTS, MANSION HOUSE ,and SMIRNOFF.} They took off in the morning and again in the afternoon . In between that there was a{Red Arrows }display. There was also a smoke balloonist from { {AMERICA}.The men in charge placed some wood on the grass and set fire to it and they placed the balloon over the fire . It would inflate slowly about half an hour ,and when it was ready it would take off with him dangling .When he reached 200ft he jumped and opened his parachute .He landed safely but the balloon lands about 2miles away.There was also a Radio 1 Road Show with Dave Lee Travis.
